QuestData.Title: The Fel Crystals
QuestData.Description: You have the key. Now use it to destroy the fel crystals.$B$BOnce they are eliminated, the magical barrier blocking the entrance to the Gloomspire will come down.$B$BAnd once the barrier is down, you'll go inside to confront Gul'dan.
QuestData.RewardText: The barrier is down. Now it's time to capture Gul'dan.
